Thank you to everyone who has worked heroically to support those affected by the #GilroyShooting. Your generosity is heartwarming. https://www.kqed.org/news/11764672/what-you-need-to-know-gilroy-garlic-festival-victims-services-resources-and-property-recovery-info …

The Family Assistance Center has also extended its operations to help those affected at Rucker Elementary School. Services provided include free childcare as well as grief counseling & emotional support. Find out more below  https://www.sccgov.org/sites/da/newsroom/newsreleases/Pages/NRA2019/FAC.aspx …

Foothill Community Health Center is offering support & counseling services for those affected. Call 408-755-3905 or walk-in to either clinic at these locations:

9460 No Name Uno, #110
Gilroy, CA 95020
Mon-Fri 8AM-7PM

2680 S. White Rd., #260
San Jose, CA 95148
Mon-Fri 8AM-5PM

It is vital that we come together as a community to support those affected by the #GilroyShooting and provide them with the affection and professional assistance they need. Please share this thread with the rest of the Bay Area community.
